CustomField.description: CSAT Saver weighted 20% & CSAT Sponsor/Trustee weighted at 80%
CustomField.formula: IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Saver__c)= True && ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c)= False), CASE((Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c), 1, -1, 2, -1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=True), CASE((Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Saver__c), 1, -1, 2, -1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0), IF( (ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Saver__c)= False && ISNULL(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c)=False), CASE(ROUND((Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Saver__c*0.2)+(Most_Recent_CSAT_Score_Sponsor_Trustee__c*0.8),0), 1, -1, 2, -1,3,0,4,1,5,1,0),0)))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CSAT Saver weighted 20% & CSAT Sponsor/Trustee weighted at 80%
CustomField.label: CSAT HM Score (Deprecated)
